title: Eric Metaxas, "Fish Out of Water: A Search for the Meaning of Life"
description:
Nationally syndicated radio host Eric Metaxas talks about his life and career. He’s interviewed by the Claremont Institute’s Center for the American Way of Life fellow Carson Holloway.
